title: FB Live Episode: 3 Keys to Start Losing Weight NOW
itunes:title: FB Live Episode: 3 Keys to Start Losing Weight NOW
description:
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse

There are things VITAL to losing weight.

They help you...

Eat the things you say you will you eat.

Find motivation instead of waiting on it.

Learn from mistakes instead of quitting on yourself.

Listen to this Facebook Live replay to find out what they are and how to do them.

I used them to lose 100lbs and still use them to this day to keep my weight off. They don't just help you lose weight but they help you keep that weight from EVER coming back.

Be sure to share this podcast with a friend or on social if you love it!
